Class VariableExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.peierls.expr.Expression

extends Expression
    An expression consisting of a single variable.

      • accept

        protected <R> R accept(Visitor<R> visitor)
        Description copied from class: Expression
        Apply a visitor function to this expression. The default implementation is to call the Visitor.visitUnknown(net.peierls.expr.Expression) method, but subclasses should override to call the visit method on one* of the concrete subclasses known to the visitor interface.
